'''''Silver fire''''' was one of the special abilities gifted to [[Chosen of Mystra]].
document_data.History: In [[Shadowdale]] in the Year of Wild Magic ([[1372 DR]]), [[Elminster]] fended off several invading [[Princes of Shade|Shadow Princes]], who were actually shadow-mattered creatures. His silver fire vaporized one of them, but also created a rift between [[Toril]] and the [[Nine Hells]]. Elminster jumped into the Nine Hells and sealed the rift from there, but such an act also burned all his magical energy and left him entirely helpless in the Hells. Only with the help of the [[Simbul]] did the [[archmage]] finally escape.
